mapper.select: SELECT PD.PDC_CODE,PD.PD_CODE,PD.PD_NAME,PD.PD_PRICE,OH.OH_CNT FROM ORDER_HISTORY AS OH JOIN ORDER_AND_CREDIT AS OAC JOIN PRODUCT AS PD WHERE OAC.OAC_NUM = #{oac_num} AND OAC.BD_DATE =#{bd_date} AND OAC.OAC_STATUS ="1" AND OAC.C_CODE = #{c_code} AND OAC.BD_DATE = OH.BD_DATE AND OH.PDC_CODE = PD.PDC_CODE AND OH.PD_CODE = PD.PD_CODE AND PD.PD_STATUS = "1"
